PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07012010-05-31,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectNew Harmonized Value-added Tax System Regulations
PrecisNEW HARMONIZED VALUE-ADDED TAX SYSTEM REGULATIONS, in order to formalize and give legal force to the previously released transitional and place of supply rules as well as introduce general anti-avoidance rules related to harmonization. The Regulations come into effect July 1, 2010, in Ontario and British Columbia.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0117 Publication Date: 2010-06-09
